name: (Arya)

Weapon1.PrimaryD: Let out a large fireball engulfing everyone in a radius (like DND fireball), single shot.
Weapon1.SecondaryD: Yells out a voice line to everyone on the map announcing your full wizard name.

Ability1D: Place an orb on an ally, if the fireball hits them heal (low cool down).
Ability2D: Place an orb on an ally, if the fireball hits them, then a second fireball occurs from their location (high cool down).
UltimateD: Shoot out a slow moving orb that insta kills anything in its way.
